title: Mohmand hydropower powerhouse construction progresses with initial concrete placement
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 01 (APP):The first structural concrete placement for the powerhouse of the Mohmand Hydropower Project in has been successfully completed.
According to Energy China Pakistan on Tuesday, the successful completion of the first structural concrete placement forÂ the powerhouse marked the official transition of the project from foundation construction to the main structural construction phase.
This has laid a solid foundation for the subsequent turbine installation and full-scale construction of the powerhouse, further advancing the overall project progress.
